item.title: About Me
item.description: I don’t really know how to explain this page. THe best way I could think of is that this page would tell you more about me - as a person! Professional: If you are interested in learning about my professional outputs or want to check out my credentials, here is my resume Personal: If you want to know about my life - the momentos and commemorations - click here! Hobbies:

item.title: Contact Me!
item.description: If you find me cool, which you probably do, then this will show you how you can contact me! Mail me to have a coffee chat - I would love to talk! Contact Us

item.title: Cool Experiences
item.description: Ever done some dope projects? Wanted to show them off? Same, which is what is happening here. Check them out!
